pr_title: Update Find in Files Package option

timeline.message:
update `Search in` option to search Package Source or Package Test
- remove .Rd files from Common R Source Files option
override default configurations when running `git grep`
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio into feature/update-package-choice

timeline.bodyText: Might be worth adding a comment indicating that we set these configuration options to override any potential user-defined options?
timeline.author: kevinushey

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer "Package Sources" or "Package Source Files" as a label here. (@jmcphers do you have an opinion?)
timeline.author: kevinushey
